author: tocheng
body:
Hello,

  the PR is to fix a simple mistake in the SiPixelQuality PCL harvester where occasionally the payload is mistakenly treated the same as payload in the last IOV and not appended to the pixel quality tag.
  **One or two IOVs are occasionally missed in the payload for prompt reco**, making **the improvement due to lumi based SiPixelQuality tag sub-optimal**.
   On the other hand, the DQM plots produced from the harvester are not effected.

   It also fixes the DQM plot for the pixel quality used in prompt reconstruction during a low statistics run. Now if the run is low statistics for pixel, such as cosmic run, DQM plot for prompt reconstruction will be corrected filled instead of empty.
title: SiPixelQuality PCL bug fix
